name: rock-climb
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.
flavor_text.platinum: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.
